cohortName: [PL 24609001] Hypoglycemia referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (24609) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 24609002] Hypoglycemia referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (24609) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 24609003] 'Hypoglycemia disorder' incident cohort: First occurrence + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Hypoglycemic disorder at first diagnosis with 365 days continous observation. Cohort exist is the end of continous observable time for the person.
